the expiry date. Do not freeze the kit components.
3 Specimen/ sample collection 
 ∙ Collect blood in a clean dry sterile vial and allow to clot 
 ∙ It is recommended that fresh sample should be used if possible.
 ∙ If serum is not to be assayed immediately, it should be stored at 2-8°C or frozen at minus 20°C (-20°C). 
 ∙ Haemolysed specimen or specimen with microbial contamination should be discarded and fresh aliquot 
should be collected.
